channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets

item.description: About the only FB feature I like these days is how it surfaces photo memories "on this day". Chrome and ChromeOS are going to replace that for me as shown below; I wrote about it yesterday here: https://t.co/dSThkxmqK2 https://t.co/qotr8eKPQJ

item.description: @qmacro Totally valid option in that case! I used this example because it was visually easy to understand. But there are other non-Linux use cases; say, F12 for Dev Tools in Chrome. CTRL - SHIFT - I works, but F12 is faster, easier and standard. üòâ
item.source:markdown: @qmacro Totally valid option in that case! I used this example because it was visually easy to understand. But there are other non-Linux use cases; say, F12 for Dev Tools in Chrome. CTRL - SHIFT - I works, but F12 is faster, easier and standard. üòâ
